Name: Data scraper
Task:
I WONT READ YOUR PROPOSAL IF ITS AI GENERATED OR A TEMPLATE.

I'm looking for a fast and efficient data scraper to generate me a list of leads who are coaches that sell infoproducts or digital products. They should sell something £500+ and should be based within the United Kingdom.

This can be ideally relationship and dating coaches, health and wellness coaches etc. They can have digital products, mentoriship, coaching or a community.

Ideally I want somebody who can be super thorough, as i have such a detailed criteria which we can talk about later. Preference is people that have done this before for the exact target market im looking for.

I need the following information:
-Company name
-Decision maker name
-Decision maker email
-Decision maker linkedin
- decision maker instragram

Decision maker will be founder, ceo or managing director.

These coaches need to fit into a particular market and be for a specific area only.  but will explain more once we have a chat.

You must also be willing to provide a sample. and tell me a specific number of leads you can generate once i give you the search parameters.

Start your response with 'email' if you have read this properly. Im looking for a list of 300 people. please apply if you can do this and in your application tell me how long this would take you and show previous work that you've completed.

Thanks!
Skills_Expertise: Data ScrapingData MiningData ExtractionData EntryMicrosoft Excel

Name: Freelancer Needed to Create Verified Contact Lists
Task:
We seek a skilled freelancer to create contact lists for electrician businesses in the Perth, Australia location. The contact lists must include:

First Name
Last Name
Email Address
Business Name

All email addresses must be verified and tested for accuracy to ensure deliverability.

Responsibilities
Research and identify businesses in the given niche and location.
Collect and compile data for each contact, ensuring all required fields are complete.
Verify and test email addresses to ensure they are valid and functional.
Deliver a clean, accurate, and organized contact list in the specified format (e.g., Excel, Google Sheets).

Requirements
Proven experience in creating and verifying business contact lists.
Familiarity with tools for email verification and testing.
Strong attention to detail and data accuracy.
Ability to meet deadlines and deliver high-quality work.

Key Details
Fixed Price Quote: Please specify your rate for creating a list of 200 contacts.
Turnaround Time: Let us know how long it will take to deliver.
Start Date: Immediately

If you’re experienced in creating verified contact lists and can ensure quality and accuracy, we’d love to hear from you. 

Please reply with:
Your fixed price quote.
Estimated completion time.
A brief overview of your experience with similar tasks.

Name: Outreach Specialist for Mendix Low-Code Tool
Task:
Job Title: Outreach Specialist for Mendix Low-Code Development Tool

Job Description:
We are looking for an energetic and results-driven Outreach Specialist to expand our network of potential clients in the United States who could benefit from using Mendix, a leading low-code development platform.

As an Outreach Specialist, you will play a critical role in identifying and connecting with businesses, showcasing the advantages of adopting Mendix to streamline their software development processes. Your goal is to build relationships, generate interest, and create opportunities for our sales team.

Responsibilities:
Conduct thorough research to identify potential client companies in the US market.
Initiate contact with decision-makers through email, phone, and other channels.
Communicate the value proposition of Mendix as a low-code development tool.
Maintain a database of leads and ensure accurate tracking of outreach activities.
Collaborate with the sales and marketing teams to develop targeted outreach campaigns.
Provide regular feedback on outreach strategies to optimize results.

Requirements:
Proven experience in B2B outreach, preferably in the technology or software sector.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to convey technical concepts in simple terms.

Proactive, self-motivated, and goal-oriented attitude.
Familiarity with low-code development tools or software development is a plus.
Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.

What We Offer:
Competitive pay based on experience and performance.
Flexible working hours with remote work opportunities.
The chance to be part of a dynamic team passionate about innovative technology.
If you are excited about connecting businesses with cutting-edge technology solutions and have the skills to thrive in this role, we’d love to hear from you!

Apply now and join us in promoting Mendix as the go-to low-code development platform!

Name: Browser Extension Developer (Chrome & Edge) - Selenium Integration
Task:
We are seeking a skilled and passionate Browser Extension Developer to join our team and play a crucial role in enhancing our Selenium-based automation applications. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining extensions for Chrome and Edge browsers, enabling seamless integration with our existing automation framework. This role requires a deep understanding of browser extension APIs, JavaScript, and a strong grasp of Selenium automation principles.
Responsibilities:
 * Develop and maintain cross-browser extensions (Chrome & Edge) that interact with and enhance Selenium-driven applications.
 * Implement features that facilitate data extraction, UI manipulation, and interaction with web elements within the browser environment.
 * Optimize extension performance for efficiency and reliability in automated workflows.
 * Collaborate with QA and development teams to troubleshoot and resolve extension-related issues.
 * Write clean, well-documented, and testable code.
 * Stay up-to-date with the latest browser extension APIs and web development trends.
 * Integrate extensions with existing Selenium automation frameworks.
 * Implement and maintain secure coding practices.
 * Participate in code reviews and contribute to improving development processes.
Required Skills and Qualifications:
 * Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS: Essential for building browser extensions.
 * Strong understanding of Chrome and Edge extension APIs: Including manifest files, content scripts, background scripts, and message passing.
 * Experience with Selenium WebDriver: Knowledge of how Selenium interacts with browsers and the ability to bridge the gap between extensions and Selenium.
 * Experience with asynchronous programming: Understanding Promises, async/await, and event-driven architectures.
 * Debugging and troubleshooting skills: Ability to identify and resolve issues in browser extensions and Selenium scripts.
 * Version control using Git: Familiarity with branching, merging, and pull requests.
 * Understanding of web security principles: Knowledge of CORS, CSP, and other security measures.
 * Experience with browser developer tools: Proficiency in using the Chrome/Edge DevTools for debugging and profiling.
 * Ability to write clear and concise technical documentation.
 * Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
 * Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Preferred Skills:
 * Experience with TypeScript.
 * Familiarity with testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Mocha).
 * Knowledge of browser automation tools beyond Selenium.
 * Experience with cross-browser compatibility testing.
 * Understanding of web scraping techniques.
 * Experience with packaging and deploying browser extensions.
 * Experience with building and interacting with REST APIs.

Name: Javascript Scrapfly Heroku Site Scraping Project
Task:
We’re looking for a Web Scraping & Automation JS Engineer to expand existing web scraping framework across multiple e-commerce websites.
You’ll be working with a solid codebase that we’ve already built on Scrapfly API.
We need someone to adapt, deploy, and debug it for new sites while improving its efficiency.

Responsibilities:
Adapt & extend our existing web scraping framework for new sites.
Deploy & maintain scrapers on Heroku
Debug & optimize scraping performance, handling infinite scroll, JavaScript rendering, and anti-bot measures.
Implement fixes & iterate on selectors, scrolling logic, and data extraction as sites evolve.

What You’ll Need:
Proven experience with web scraping using Cheerio, Puppeteer, Selenium, or Scrapfly.
Strong knowledge of JavaScript/Node.js and handling dynamic sites.
Experience deploying scrapers to Heroku or similar cloud platforms.
Familiarity with MySQL (or similar databases) for data storage.
Ability to debug quickly and iterate on failed scrapes.
(Bonus) Experience handling CAPTCHAs, proxies, and anti-bot measures.

Include a relevant Github repo link
